title: Installation issue: dakota
body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install dakota # Fill in the exact spec you are using
...
1 error found in build log:
     337    -- Could NOT find Boost
     338    -- Looking for lround
     339    -- Looking for lround - found
     340    -- Looking for 3 include files sys/types.h, ..., time.h
     341    -- Looking for 3 include files sys/types.h, ..., time.h - found
     342    linking utilib against m;tinyxml
  >> 343    CMake Error at packages/external/acro/packages/colin/CMakeLists.txt:11 (message):
     344       Cannot build colin without Boost.  Please enable USE_BOOST and set Boost_INCLUDE_DIR
     345
     346
     347    -- Configuring incomplete, errors occurred!
     348    See also "/tmp/elmervii/spack-stage/spack-stage-I4OboM/dakota-6.9.0.src/spack-build/CMakeFil
            es/CMakeOutput.log".
     349    See also "/tmp/elmervii/spack-stage/spack-stage-I4OboM/dakota-6.9.0.src/spack-build/CMakeFil
            es/CMakeError.log".

```

### Platform and user environment

Please report your OS here:
```commandline
$ uname -a 
Linux quartz1154 3.10.0-862.14.4.1chaos.ch6.x86_64 #1 SMP Wed Sep 26 12:27:08 PDT 2018 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ lsb_release -d
Description:    Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server release 7.5 (Maipo)
``` 
### Additional information
Boost was already found at some point by cmake, and running ccmake the the build directory shows what seems to be a good configuration. 

-- Finding relocatable package SPARSE_GRID with directory external/VPISparseGrid
-- Setting SPARSE_GRID_DIR = /tmp/elmervii/spack-stage/spack-stage-I4OboM/dakota-6.9.0.src/spack-build/packages/external/VPISparseGrid
-- Boost version: 1.69.0
-- Pecos using previously specified Teuchos in /tmp/elmervii/spack-stage/spack-stage-I4OboM/dakota-6.9.0.src/spack-build/packages/external/trilinos/packages/teuchos
-- Finding relocatable package DFFTPACK with directory dfftpack
-- Finding relocatable package LHS with directory LHS
-- Finding relocatable package SPARSE_GRID with directory VPISparseGrid
-- Surfpack using previously specified Teuchos in /tmp/elmervii/spack-stage/spack-stage-I4OboM/dakota-6.9.0.src/spack-build/packages/external/trilinos/packages/teuchos
-- Boost version: 1.69.0
-- Found the following Boost libraries:
--   serialization
-- Finding relocatable package CONMIN with directory CONMIN
-- Finding relocatable package NCSUOPT with directory NCSUOpt
-- Found DL: /usr/lib64/libdl.so  


Build didn't make it past the configure stage, 

I tried extending the args with this:

                '-DBoost_DIR:STRING=%s' % spec['boost'].prefix,
                '-DBoost_INCLUDE_DIR:STRING=%s' % spec['boost'].prefix+'/include',
                '-DUSE_BOOST:BOOL=ON',

(Also with :PATH= instead of STRING) And that didn't work. 
I'm not good at cmake.
